a9b02a49-31a4-46a2-b3fd-3266d2821ca5.description: CallMiner is offering this opportunity, to all current customers, to earn a training certification in Eureka Analyze software. This will allow customers to start their CallMiner journey on a solid foundation and speed-to-value by learning the vocabulary, features, and basics of Analyze. This certification will be a prerequisite for other higher-level certifications. Customers should contact their Customer Success Director for details.
a9b02a49-31a4-46a2-b3fd-3266d2821ca5.name: CallMiner Analyze Fundamentals Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Approximate time to complete is 45-60 minutes. Completion of the Analyze Fundamentals Training Program. The program consists of 10 courses identifying the major components of the Analyze software: Menu tabs, Quick Navigation Menu, Search Tab, Search Components, Search Results, Solutions, Dashboard, Explorer, Left Pane Summary Data, and Topic Miner.

Completion of a timed assessment (60 minutes) with a passing score of 80%. There will be 50 questions covering all topics in the Analyze Fundamentals Training Program. Question Types: True/False, Multiple Choice, and Matching.
